page.title: 18A RIPPINGALE VIEW OF LIFE
page.content: In Britain today,there is much comfort and contentment but also much squalor and dissatisfaction.{Unemployment is {very high}with much of the working population on a low rate of pay.Rented or council accomodation is in inadequate supply and often of low standard in spite of the efforts of Government and local authorities, welfare services and voluntary bodies. Other factors detrimental to the quality of life are{vandalism}and a lack of respect for other people's property,lack of discipline and too much expectation of the Welfare State. {Conservation}of our countryside and urban areas is now of great concern and much is being done to enhance our environment and conserve our heritage. New technology gives more leisure,a fact not welcomed by all but appreciated and utilised by many.
